snippet.title: Sunlight Scream - Official trailer [ENG]
snippet.description:
Sunlight Scream - Official Trailer [ENG]

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608440

Max Hardy returns to Sunlight City, the city of his childhood to his own brother. A new university, new acquaintances, friends, love... And all the fun is cut short when students one by one begin to die at the hands of a masked killer. Will you be able to find out who's behind the mask before all your friends die? Who will survive and who will die? It's up to you!
